mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.name AS categoryName, t3.name AS manufacturerName, t4.name AS supplierName FROM itam_licenses t1 LEFT JOIN itam_categories t2 ON t1.category_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN itam_manufacturers t3 ON t1.manufacturer_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN itam_suppliers t4 ON t1.supplier_id = t4.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT t1.*, t2.name AS categoryName, t3.name AS manufacturerName, t4.name AS supplierName FROM itam_licenses t1 LEFT JOIN itam_categories t2 ON t1.category_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN itam_manufacturers t3 ON t1.manufacturer_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN itam_suppliers t4 ON t1.supplier_id = t4.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT t1.*, CASE WHEN t1.owner_type = 'user' THEN t2.nick_name WHEN t1.owner_type = 'asset' THEN t3.name WHEN t1.owner_type = 'location' THEN t4.name ELSE NULL END AS ownerName FROM itam_allocations t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t1.owner_type = 'user' AND t1.owner_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN itam_device t3 ON t1.owner_type = 'asset' AND t1.owner_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN itam_locations t4 ON t1.owner_type = 'location' AND t1.owner_id = t4.id WHERE t1.item_type = 'license' AND t1.item_id = #{licenseId} AND t1.deleted = 0
SELECT t2.name as categoryName, count(*) as count FROM itam_licenses t1 JOIN itam_categories t2 ON t1.category_id = t2.id WHERE t1.deleted = 0 GROUP BY t2.id, t2.name
